ygData.subject: Re: Mudwater Rune no drop?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep, it sure is NODROP. There are reportedly several exploits to trade nodrop items. None of which I suggest you try.  8)   I have a mudwater rune as well,
ygData.messageBody:
> I have a RL lvl 35 Rogue friend who acquired a Mudwater Rune recently.
> He can't recall offline if it's No Drop. I figure it is, being a quest
> item, but thought I'd ask. He didn't reply when I asked him casually if
> he'd get an Opoline Helm for me, too. *g*

Yep, it sure is NODROP.

There are reportedly several exploits to trade nodrop items.
None of which I suggest you try. 8) I have a mudwater rune
as well, just never attempted to get a new opaline helm.

Harmonic.
